titles.title: B281 - (English) yeshu hun mero kasto bilaas

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
येशू हुन्‌ मेरो कस्तो विलास,
दिँदछन्‌ मनमा महिमाको आश
मुक्तिको भागी स्वर्ग मेरो घर,
उनमा म बस्छु सधैँ निडर
Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine
Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine
Heir of salvation, purchase of God
Born of His spirit, washed in His blood

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(यो मेरो हाल छ,
यो मेरो गान,
गर्छु प्रशंसा प्रतिदिनै) २
(This is my story, this is my song
Praising my Savior all the day long) ~2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
पूरा भरोसा, आनन्द र सुख,
अब मेरो मनमा न शोक न दु:ख
ख्रीष्टबाट भयो दयाको ज्ञान,
दूतगण अब गर्छन्‌ प्रेमको बखान।
Perfect submission, perfect delight,
Visions of rapture now burst on my sight;
Angels descending, bring from above
Echoes of mercy, whispers of love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
विश्‍वास म राख्छु, ख्रीष्ट मेरो नाथ,
उनैमा बस्छु सुरक्षासाथ
उनैमा प्रेमले पाउँछु विश्राम
जानेछु अन्तमा स्वर्गीय लोक।
Perfect submission, all is at rest,
I in my Savior am happy and blest;
Watching and waiting, looking above,
Filled with His goodness, lost in His love.
